posts.post_title: SOLD: a pair of Piano Legs...N172 Old Judge George Gore, NY Giants
posts.post_content:
For SOLD here are a pair of cards depicting NY centerfielder George "Piano Legs" Gore.


Prices are postpaid, in the continental U.S., net to me.
